name: Frog's Eye Salad
author: Donna Menz

ingredients.name: (1 lb.) pkg. Acini De Pepe, uncooked

instructions: Combine sugar, flour and salt. Stir in pineapple juice and eggs. Cook, stirring constantly until thickened. Add lemon juice; cool to room temperature. Prepare Acini De Pepe according to package directions; drain. Combine egg mixture and pasta, mix well and refrigerate overnight in airtight container. Add remaining ingredients and mix thoroughly. Refrigerate in airtight container until thoroughly chilled. Refrigerate leftovers.
